markdownRemark.html:
Hi Everyone,

we have moved our classes online.

If you are a urban sports club member, you can reserve the classes in advance and attend them.

If you want to drop in, our classes are still donation based, so you can send us a donation to our paypal account or write to us to get our banking details.

You can join our classes via Zoom:

Prenzlauer Berg: Zoom

Kreuzberg: Zoom

Enjoy being present.
